explanations.machine learning: The paper uses artificial neural network and logistic regression, which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (neural network and logistic regression) are supervised learning approaches as they involve training on labeled data.
explanations.regression: Logistic regression is explicitly mentioned as one of the methods used for estimating the probability of default.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of artificial neural networks for estimating loan returns and default probabilities.
explanations.logistic regression: The paper explicitly states the use of logistic regression to estimate the probability of default of loans.
